Package gui.controller

Class MovingObjectController

java.lang.Object
gui.controller.MovingObjectController
public class MovingObjectController
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements some methods to move around and to process the fields.
Author:
Judith

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MovingObjectController​(GameScene gameScene, MovingObject movingObject, GameController gameController, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, CourtTrade courtTrade)
    Constructor of the class MovingObjectController that initializes some objects and by calling the method initializeFunctionaliy() an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController to make some actions possible.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void initializeFunctionality()
    This method initializes an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController and hands to the constructor the GAME_SCENE object of the actual game.
    private void move​(char direction)
    This method moves the moving object depending on the direction that is handed to it.
    void moveObject()
    This method proofs if only one of the directions right, left, up and down is pressed.
    private void movingSuccessful​(int x, int y)
    If moving is successful the image view of the moving object is set to the new tile and if the tractor or the harvester is selected the tank gets decreased.
    void proofAction()
    This method proofs, if some action is possible on the tile on which the moving object is standing.
    void proofFieldAction()
    This method proofs if the right machine or working device is attached to process the field depending on the stage of growth.
    private void rotate​(char direction)
    This method rotates the image view of the moving object depending on the moving direction.
    private void setButtonAction​(boolean disabled, java.lang.String text)
    This method helps to set the button action disabled or able to click and to set the text of it.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MovingObjectController

      public MovingObjectController​(GameScene gameScene, MovingObject movingObject, GameController gameController, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, CourtTrade courtTrade)
      Constructor of the class MovingObjectController that initializes some objects and by calling the method initializeFunctionaliy() an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController to make some actions possible.
      Parameters:
      gameScene - the gameScene object of the actual game
      movingObject - the movingObject object of the actual game
      gameController - the gameController object of the actual game
      gameValue - the gameValue object of the actual game
      farmer - the farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the harvester object of the actual game
      cultivator - the cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the dumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the seedDrill objet of the actual game
      fieldTile - the fieldTile object of the actual game
      silo - the silo object of the actual game
      courtTrade - the courtTrade object of the actual game

  • Method Details

    • initializeFunctionality

      private void initializeFunctionality()
      This method initializes an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController and hands to the constructor the GAME_SCENE object of the actual game.

    • moveObject

      public void moveObject()
      This method proofs if only one of the directions right, left, up and down is pressed. It calls the method move() and hands it a character depending on the direction in which the moving object is moving.

    • move

      private void move​(char direction)
      This method moves the moving object depending on the direction that is handed to it. If moving is successful it sets the boolean true and the image view of the moving object is set to the new tile with the help of the method movingSuccessful().
      Parameters:
      direction - to which the player want to move the moving object

    • movingSuccessful

      private void movingSuccessful​(int x, int y)
      If moving is successful the image view of the moving object is set to the new tile and if the tractor or the harvester is selected the tank gets decreased.
      Parameters:
      x - column to which the moving object is set
      y - row to which the moving object is set

    • rotate

      private void rotate​(char direction)
      This method rotates the image view of the moving object depending on the moving direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - moving direction of the moving object

    • proofAction

      public void proofAction()
      This method proofs, if some action is possible on the tile on which the moving object is standing. If some action is possible the button isn't disabled any longer and the text of the button show what action is possible.

    • setButtonAction

      private void setButtonAction​(boolean disabled, java.lang.String text)
      This method helps to set the button action disabled or able to click and to set the text of it.
      Parameters:
      disabled - boolean to set the action button disabled
      text - text that is shown on the action button

    • proofFieldAction

      public void proofFieldAction()
      This method proofs if the right machine or working device is attached to process the field depending on the stage of growth.
